title: Federal Hall National Memorial: Accessibility
body: Accessibility         The wheelchair access ramp to Federal Hall is located to the right of the 15 Pine Street Entrance. NPS  National Parks: Accessible to Everyone The National Park Service provides a variety of programs, exhibits, and informational opportunities for all of our visitors. Federal Hall National Memorial is fully accessible to wheelchair users. Ramp access is available through the rear entrance at 15 Pine Street. An elevator provides access to the upper and lower levels of the building.
